title: Ungagged!
subtitle: Ungagged is a collective of left wing writers & podcasters. We support independence for Scotland, and are against Tory Brexit, and the scapegoating of immigrants, refugees, trans people and our vulnerable citizens (amongst other principled, logical left wing positions). 1/2 pic.twitter.com/mYoGuDZPt2

title: Isobel Williams
subtitle: My pledge post #GE2019: to write weekly to my MP re policy changes / failure to deliver on manifesto commitments. title: Naveed
subtitle: For example Zaatari refugee camp in Jordan which had over 120,000 Syrian refugees is full of Saudi donated homes for these people, medical centres and clothes donated by the Saudi government and its people. I’ve worked alongside Saudi medics and they’re extremely humble people. pic.twitter.com/NjrCcCYAbK

title: Christopher Lamb
subtitle:
#PopeFrancis blesses a cross with life jacket as he welcomes 33 refugees from #Lesbos
